remarks: The value of a functional is nonzero at a nonzero vector in the orthocomplement of its kernel.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Jan-2015.)
statement:
dochfln0.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dochfln0.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochfln0.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochfln0.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
dochfln0.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
dochfln0.n $e |- N = ( 0g ` R ) $.
dochfln0.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) $.
dochfln0.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` U ) $.
dochfln0.l $e |- L = ( LKer ` U ) $.
dochfln0.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dochfln0.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
dochfln0.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( ( ._|_ ` ( L ` G ) ) \ { .0. } ) ) $.
dochfln0 $p |- ( ph -> ( G ` X ) =/= N ) $.
